feed.title: Heavy Hitters
feed.subtitle: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

entry.title: CFB Week 4 and NFL Week 3 Picks - Season 3 Episode 42

link.title: CFB Week 4 and NFL Week 3 Picks - Season 3 Episode 42

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for the games this weekend in both the NFL and college football.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
entry.summary: This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for the games this weekend in both the NFL and college football.

entry.title: MLB Wild Card Updates and AL East Divisional Race, CFB Week 3 Picks, NFL Week 2 Picks, and UFC 306 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 41

link.title: MLB Wild Card Updates and AL East Divisional Race, CFB Week 3 Picks, NFL Week 2 Picks, and UFC 306 Predictions - Season 3 Episode 41

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us an update based off of what has been going on in the MLB and his thoughts on the wildcard race in the American and National League along with the divisional race for the AL East. Dean also gives us his predictions for this week’s games in college football and the NFL along with UFC 306 at the Sphere.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

Dean also gives us his predictions for this week’s games in college football and the NFL along with UFC 306 at the Sphere.

entry.title: CFB Week 2 and NFL Week 1 Picks, Leon Draisaitl and Trent Williams Get Paid - Season 3 Episode 40

link.title: CFB Week 2 and NFL Week 1 Picks, Leon Draisaitl and Trent Williams Get Paid - Season 3 Episode 40

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his week 2 picks in college football along with his picks for week 1 of the 2024 NFL season that kicks off on Thursday. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to Oilers star Centre Leon Draisaitl and 49ers star Offensive tackle Trent Williams both earning big contracts and resigning with their teams.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

After that, Dean gives us his reaction to Oilers star Centre Leon Draisaitl and 49ers star Offensive tackle Trent Williams both earning big contracts and resigning with their teams.

entry.title: CFB Week 1 Picks, NFL 2024-25 Season Predictions, AEW All in 2024 Recap and WWE Bash in Berlin Preview - Season 3 Episode 39

link.title: CFB Week 1 Picks, NFL 2024-25 Season Predictions, AEW All in 2024 Recap and WWE Bash in Berlin Preview - Season 3 Episode 39

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his week 1 picks to kickoff the 2024 college football season for the big games this weekend along with his predictions for the 2024-25 NFL season. After that, Dean gives us a recap of AEW All In, which took place this past Sunday. He also gives us his takeaways for the event and his grade. To end off the episode, Dean gives us a preview of WWE Bash In Berlin, which is this Saturday and who he thinks wins each match.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Haason Reddick and Brandon Aiyuk Trade Request Updates and MLB Post Trade-Deadline Takeaways - Season 3 Episode 38

link.title: Haason Reddick and Brandon Aiyuk Trade Request Updates and MLB Post Trade-Deadline Takeaways - Season 3 Episode 38

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean provides us an update in regards to Haason Reddick requesting a trade from the New York Jets on Monday along with another update regarding Brandon Aiyuk after his trade request form the San Francisco 49ers and where those situations stand. After that, Dean closes out the episode by giving us his takeaways since the MLB trade deadline and All-Star break.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

entry.title: MLB Trade Deadline Recap and WWE SummerSlam Predictions - Season 3 Episode 37

link.title: MLB Trade Deadline Recap and WWE SummerSlam Predictions - Season 3 Episode 37

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean and special guest from the One on One podcast, Jack Acello, give us a recap of what happened on Tuesday on trade deadline day in the MLB along with other trades that happened from over the weekend. After that, they give us their predictions for each match in this SummerSlam, which takes place on Saturday in Cleveland, Ohio.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

entry.title: MLB Pre-Trade Deadline Day Updates and Takeaways, UFC 304 Predictions, Trouble in San Francisco, and EA College Football 25 Review - Season 3 Episode 36

link.title: MLB Pre-Trade Deadline Day Updates and Takeaways, UFC 304 Predictions, Trouble in San Francisco, and EA College Football 25 Review - Season 3 Episode 36

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us trade news along with his takeaways in the MLB season thus far before trade deadline day. After that, Dean gives us his predictions for the main event and co-main event of UFC 304 this Saturday. Next, Dean gives us an update of what’s going on in San Francisco as the 49ers deal with the holdout misses they’re having from key players. Finally, Dean discusses his thoughts on the EA College Football 25 video game and gives us his rating on the game.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: MLB Monthly Takeaways and Winners and Losers From the First Wave of NHL Free Agency - Season 3 Episode 35

link.title: MLB Monthly Takeaways and Winners and Losers From the First Wave of NHL Free Agency - Season 3 Episode 35

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his takeaways from June in the 2024 MLB season before All-Star break. Along with that, Dean gives us his winners and losers after the first wave of free agency in the NHL.

entry.title: 2024 NHL Stanley Cup Finals Recap - Season 3 Episode 34

link.title: 2024 NHL Stanley Cup Finals Recap - Season 3 Episode 34

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a recap of what happened in game 7 of the 2024 NHL Stanley Cup Final along with giving his takeaway for the series and his reaction to the Panthers winning their first Stanley Cup in franchise history.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: UFC 302: Makhachev-Poirier Recap and NHL Stanley Cup Finals Preview and Prediction - Season 3 Episode 33

link.title: UFC 302: Makhachev-Poirier Recap and NHL Stanley Cup Finals Preview and Prediction - Season 3 Episode 33

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a recap of what happened in the main event of UFC 302 between Islam Makhachev and Dustin Poirier along what’s next for both fighters after the event. After that, Dean gives us a preview and his predictions for the 2024 Stanley Cup Final between the Florida Panthers and Edmonton Oilers.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/
